gods.name: Mortal
gods.description: A simple, and a normal mortal player. No special powers, that's it!

gods.name: Apollo
gods.description:
Your Move:
Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker's space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.

gods.name: Artemis
gods.description:
Your Move:
Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.

gods.name: Athena
gods.description:
Opponent's Turn: 
If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.

gods.name: Atlas
gods.description:
Your Build:
Your Worker may build a dome at any level.

gods.name: Demeter
gods.description:
Your Build:
Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.

gods.name: Hephaestus
gods.description:
Your Build:
Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.

gods.name: Minotaur
gods.description:
Your Move: 
Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker's space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.

gods.name: Pan
gods.description:
Win Condition: 
You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.

gods.name: Prometheus
gods.description:
Your Turn: 
If your Workers does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.

gods.name: Chronus
gods.description:
Win Condition:
You also win when there are at least five Complete Towers on the board.

gods.name: Hera
gods.description:
Opponent's Turn:
An opponent cannot win by moving into a perimeter space.

gods.name: Hestia
gods.description:
Your Build:
Your Worker may build one additional time, but this cannot be on a perimeter space.

gods.name: Triton
gods.description:
Your Move:
Each time your Worker moves into a perimeter space, it may immediately move again.

gods.name: Zeus
gods.description:
Your Build:
Your Worker may build a block under itself.
